We have two of them, stateless clients and storage rent.
With stateless clients, there's a single 32-byte storage route, and when you send a transaction

as a user send a transaction to the network, you have to supply the Merkle proof of your

But the proof data that you want to supply is this Merkle branch from your leaf account

Now these intermediate tree nodes change when the guy next to you makes a transaction.
